example_sentence: indicates possession, like adding 's to a noun

pinyin: Wǒ de gǒu zài hē shuǐ.

example_sentence: indicates a completed or finished action

at; on; in; indicates an action in progress

what? (replaces the noun to turn a statement into a question)
